articles.title: South African Variant Can "Break Through" Pfizer Vaccine: Israeli Study - NDTV
articles.description: The coronavirus variant discovered in South Africa can "break through" Pfizer/BioNTech's COVID-19 vaccine to some extent, a real-world data study in Israel found, though its prevalence in the country is low and the research has not been peer reviewed
articles.content:
Researchers cautioned, though, that the study only had a small sample size. (Representational)

articles.title: Unbeaten Rizwan secures Pakistan win - SuperSport
articles.description: An unbeaten 74 from 50 balls by opener Mohammad Rizwan led Pakistan to a four-wicket victory with one ball to spare against South Africa in their T20 International at the Wanderers on Saturday.
